newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker final report and prices - April 1.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker final report and prices - April 1.

text.p: (DELIVERED U.S.$/TONNE) 380 CST 180 CST MDO GAS OIL

COMMENTS - Singapore bunker prices were within Monday's range with firm prompt demand holding prices up, traders said on Tuesday. "Some shipowners who had delayed buying their requirement earlier while expecting prices to fall, decided that they have to cover despite the firm prices," said a trader. Some majors were offering at higher levels for 380-cst, quoting at $100 per tonne but there were few takers, he said.
